text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
D.C. Resolution 20-80, effective April 9, 2013

20 DCSTAT 1463

A RESOLUTION

Proposed
Resolution
20-150

To appoint Ms. Jennifer Budoff to the Children and Youth Investment Trust Corporation Board of
Directors as a non-voting advisor.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the “Children and Youth Investment Trust Corporation Board of
Directors Jennifer Budoff Appointment Resolution of 2013”.

Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia appoints:
Ms. Jennifer Budoff
4410 49th Street, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20016
(Ward 3)
as a non-voting advisor to the Board of Directors of the Children and Youth Investment Trust
Corporation, established pursuant to section 2404 of the Children and Youth Initiative
Establishment Act of 1999, effective October 20, 1999 (D.C. Law 13-38; 46 DCR 6408), for a 2year term to end April 19, 2015.
Sec. 3. The Secretary to the Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of
this resolution, upon its adoption, to the appointee, the chairperson of the Board of Directors of
the Children and Youth Investment Trust Corporation, and the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately upon the first date of publication in
the District of Columbia Register.

Youth
Investment
Trust
Corporation

Directors
Jennifer
